scripts.build: cd jaguar-client && yarn && yarn build && cd .. && cd jaguar-server && yarn
scripts.clean: concurrently "rimraf node_modules yarn.lock" "cd jaguar-client && rimraf node_modules build yarn.lock" "cd jaguar-server && rimraf node_modules build yarn.lock"
scripts.start: concurrently "cd jaguar-client && yarn start" "cd jaguar-server && yarn start"
